version_description:
- Add animation for manual refresh;
- Improve the Widget stability;
- Enhance the data loading algorithm.

- Add post credits scene;
- Enhance Widget;
- Improve iPhone SE / iPhone 5 display;
- Change icon and splash style.

- Support iOS 11;
- Support Apple Watch & watchOS;
- Add weather translation for Chinese;
- Add wind direction + speed and precipitation;
- Add more air quality data;
- Add Widget Celsius and Fahrenheit setting synchronized with main application;
- Improve the locating accuracy;
- Improve user interface for all iPad devices;
- Change few user interface.
- Fix location authorization message for iOS 11.

- Improve the locating accuracy;
- Change the display of application icon.

Global cities supported is coming soon :)

- Add customize cities globally and display its current weather;
- Add weather forecast for all cities;
- Add more air quality data;
- Add current citiy for Widget;
- Add Beaufort wind force scale;
- Add air quality data for all cities;
- Add iPhone X supported.

- Add icon description in setting viewï¼›
- Fix AQI information for some places;
- Fix icon display for some weather status.

- Add Christmas theme.
Merry Christmas and Happy New Year !

Merry Christmas and Happy New Year !
- Improve Christmas theme;
- Improve the click area back to main application in Widget;
- Improve the function icons click area;
- Enhance the data getting speed.
- Improve the network connection.
- Chinese Spring Festival Theme

1. Change to normal icon;
2. Fix iPhone X status bar display.

Weather notification and more features coming soon.

- Add future 12 and 24 hours weather forecast;
- Add future 10 days weather forecast;
- Add pollutant with single page;
- Add UV index, pressure;
- Add detail description for each icon and item;
- Improve the weather information transfer speed;
- Fix some data display issues.
- Improve the user interface for iPhone 5, iPhone 5s, iPhone 5c, iPhone SE, and iPad all models.
- Fix probability of precipitation and precipitation in Widget.

- Add UV Index information page;
- Add AQI more detail information;
- Add menu information page;
- Add battery information synchronize with system.


# Awards

App Store - Today Recommendation, Apps Recommendation
App Store - Pixel Collection Recommendation, Top Paid No.3 & Weather Top Paid No.1 in history
Product Hunt - Recommendation
Alipay, Sspai, Appinn, Zuimeia, AppSo - Recommendation
Smzdm - Wiki Collection

- Add global cities feature in map page;
- Improve the map and city font with pixel style.
- Fix Widget 'Unable to load' issue for iOS 10.

- Fix App crash issue.


# New Awards

PriceTag - Taking care in Typhoon days.

- Add more weather icon and description;
- Update application description.
- Fix website display issue for iPhoneX.
- Fix website display issue for iPhoneX.

- Improve the weather icons display and description;
- Improve the features for Apple Watch.

- Improve user interface for iPhone XR, iPhone XS, and iPhone XS Max;
- Improve user interface for Apple Watch Series 4 with 44mm and 40mm cases.

- Optimized for new iPad Pro devices, including iPad Pro (11-inch) and iPad Pro (12.9-inch 3rd generation);
- Optimized for iPhone 7 and above devices;
- Improve user interface for iPhone XR, iPhone XS, and iPhone XS Max.

- Optimize 12/24 hour time format sync with iOS system;
- Optimize touch experience.

- Improve the weather icon display;
- Fix refresh icon display issue;
- Fix send mail system version issue.

- Add world time in city list for each location;
- Add customized app icon in settings;
- Add forecast 6 days information in widget;
- Improve the social media sharing feature.

- Optimize for new iOS 13;
- Optimize for new devices, including iPhone 11 Pro Max, iPhone 11 Pro and iPhone 11.

- Add dark mode for widget;
- Add feels like temperature;
- Add sunrise and sunset time for recent 3 days;
- Add moonrise and moonset time for recent 3 days.
- Improve user interface of some icons.

- Improve icon user interface for iPad device;
- Fix sunrise, sunset, moonrise, and moonset display issue.

- Improve location information;
- Fix some issues.
- Fix issue for widget display.

- Update new user interface for watchOS version, including sync all location data with app
- Add weather icon and temperature range in location list
- Add nature sound white noise feature, including heavy rain, thunderstorm, and strong wind
- Add ~Personal Weather Station~ device supported, including temperature, humidity, and pomodoro timer features via oled screen and bluetooth, see more DIY introduction with Arduino UNO and Nano in app
- Add pomodoro timer description.
- Update Personal Weather Station description link
- Support new iOS 14 and watchOS 7

- Add home screen widget supported for iOS 14
- Dark mode color supported
- Fix temperature uint in home screen widget

- Improve user experience for home screen widget;
- Improve paging for iOS 14.
